About Me

A few things about me...

BIO

Hello, my name is Renee.

I am a recent UCLA graduate with a B.A in Asian Languages and Linguistics. Currently, I am working towards my Masters in Nursing. I love taking care of others so nursing is the perfect fit!

A typical day for me is work, class, work, class, more work and more work. I wouldn't say all work and no play, I am in an amazing sorority filled with strong and wonderfull women. They helped me to distress and enjoy my time at UCLA.

My favorite place to be when I am not at school is the beach. It is the prefect place to refresh and clear my mind.

I have so many hopes and dreams that I want to make come true, and on this portfolio you can see all those things and more unfold.

Thank you for reading!
